Comments_List: Learn to watch for more than just the plot in movies, and the social importance in the movies. The midterm papers do well to compare and contrast different films.
I learned more about film analysis, and about cultural background behind many of the representations of sport in media.
Low workload, just watching movies with reading responses before class with two papers.
Yes, interesting class if you're interested in sports and the role that media plays in the world of sports.
